column1: #Text=Sokka says : " Making him feel better is putting me in a world of hurt .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We should tell him .
#Text=" Katara says : " Uh ... Just a new waterbending move I learned .
#Text=But enough practicing , we have a whole temple to see !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You know , you ca n't protect him forever .
